About the Company: Phyto Chem (India) Ltd is engaged in the manufacturing and marketing of pesticides for the agricultural sector. The company has also diversified into real estate activities.The pesticides being manufactured by the company have applications on a wide range of crops like paddy, cotton, ground nut, sugar cane, chillies, pulses, cereals, vegetables etc. At present, it has dealers and distributors in Andhra Pradesh, Karnataka & Tamilnadu.The product range of the company includes Insecticides,Synthetic Pyrethroids,Fungicides,Weedicides,Herbicides and Acaricides.
